#summary Hardware
----
=Boards= 
The Wireless Widget is comprised of a core widget board, that incorporates the RF and CPU, and a Personality board.  The Personality boards provide the widget with it's the interface to the outside world.

All widget boards are Arduino compatible and integrate into the Arduino development environment.  See [Software] for more details.

 ==Core Widget Boards==
  * [RFM12BCore] 433MHz, 868MHz, 915MHz

 ==Personality Boards==
  * [Prototype]
